Text: DocumentsYou should now have all Huber executed documents Capacity Release Transaction Agreement amended covering Trailblazer Transaction Agreement amended covering CIG Assignment Trailblazer Assignment CIG Let me know if you have not received any of the above Once executed by Enron please return one original of each to my attention Thanks and happy holidays Brian Stone

Re Trailblazer Assignment Cc Ive had the document executed Who should I send it to you or Mark If you want it what is your street address so I can overnight it to you Thanks Brian PM Brian Mark forward the executed docs to me The Trailblazer Assignment was not included I have attached the assignment in case you dont have the one I forwarded earlier Please execute and return Also the Amended and Restated Transaction No was initialled but was not executed I am forwarding those back to you for execution Thanks for your cooperation See attached file Huber Trailblazer Assignment Finaldoc

Re Huber Contracts Cc Huber has executed the following documents today Trailblazer Assignment and Assumption Agreement signed addl original Amended and Restated Transaction Agreement Enfolio Master Firm Purchase Sale Agreement replacing a previously executed fax version I will overnight the documents to you Please have them executed and return one of each for my files Thanks for your help and best of luck in your new venture at Enron Brian Stone

San Juan ProposalMark Help me out here I took our current marketing arrangements selling into the spot market assuming the worst at EPNGSJ Index and compared it to the pricing under the three tranches I realize we are mixing IF and GDA but IF can be swapped for GDA and viceversa in the swing swap market My dilemma is that the firm transportation does not appear to be accretive in fact it results in mmbtu less than current arrangement accross the total volume What is really killing it is the NW basis and discountam I using the right one FYI I used ENAs midmarket basis for the month strip going forward What am I missing here

Re San Jaun Purchase AgreementsMark I am going to be out of the office Wednesday and Thursdayplease coordinate with Jason the release proceduresI am traveling with David Pruner an we will discuss an review the latest proposalI will have comments for you Friday or Monday brian Whitt Mark AM I have changed the dates and prices in these agreements but those should be the only changes necessary Let me know if either of you see any other changes that are necessary Brian lets get together this afternoon and see if we can organize our other capacity release transactions that need to be completed by December Does your time work Huber Capacity ReleaseEl Paso finaldoc JM Huber Confirm CalTransport finaldoc JM Huber Confirm CalWO finaldoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
